name: Claude Van Clamme Presents: The Pet Snake Chronicles
name_original: Claude Van Clamme Presents: The Pet Snake Chronicles
description:
You have been tasked with looking after a collection of giant snakes. Green snakes are ravenous and will eat the nearest food to them, even if that means going through their own tail. Blue Snakes will head towards any food that it is inline with. 

Controls: WASD to move. Space to jump (kinda useless but its in there). E to pickup and drop objects.

Made by 'We are Not Spies'.
